content: I could swear that FCP is for a week, but I've a PR that is in FCP for 10 days at this point? Has the FCP duration changed?
:thinking: I guess I should expect a FCP completion any second now then
@nagisa which PR are you referrring to? If it's an MCP (major change proposal), the FCP time is indeed around 10 days (source)
@nagisa The 10 day timeframe means that it's always long enough for any once-a-week meeting to occur, and to give people who can only work on Rust on certain days to see it.
It's been 10 days for as long as I've been involved in Rust.
Looks like it became 10 days in 2016, shortly after I joined, around the time when we switched from manual RFC handling to rfcbot.
yeah the fcp just concluded for the linked PR anyway...
